thread.title: Mishka Exim Consolidated December 2024 Net Sales at Rs 0.54 crore, up 40.72% Y-o-Y
thread.title_full: Mishka Exim Consolidated December 2024 Net Sales at Rs 0.54 crore, up 40.72% Y-o-Y

author: Abhishek Shingare
title: Mishka Exim Consolidated December 2024 Net Sales at Rs 0.54 crore, up 40.72% Y-o-Y
text: Reported Consolidated quarterly numbers for Mishka Exim are: Net Sales at Rs 0.54 crore in December 2024 up 40.72% from Rs. 0.38 crore in December 2023. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 0.04 crore in December 2024 down 5.71% from Rs. 0.04 crore in December 2023. EBITDA stands at Rs. 0.09 crore in December 2024 up 50% from Rs. 0.06 crore in December 2023. Mishka Exim EPS has decreased to Rs. 0.03 in December 2024 from Rs. 0.03 in December 2023. Mishka Exim shares closed at 42.85 on January 09, 2025 (BSE) and has given 23.38% returns over the last 6 months and 24.02% over the last 12 months. Mishka Exim Consolidated Quarterly Results in Rs.
